title: What will happen to the Stray Kids members if they disbanded? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would assume many of them would just still be signed with JYP. They would probably just put some members into the next group they’re making or maybe debut them into different units. I would also assume 3RACHA would still be together since they’re a pre-debut group. We never know. I can see some of them dabbling into the acting business if Stray Kids disbanded. But honestly it’s hard to say.
